statements: SELECT * FROM whitewater_rafting_routes
SELECT route_name, difficulty_level FROM whitewater_rafting_routes
SELECT distance_km, route_name FROM whitewater_rafting_routes ORDER BY distance_km DESC
SELECT * FROM whitewater_rafting_routes WHERE difficulty_level = 'Intermediate'
SELECT route_name, safety_procedure FROM whitewater_rafting_routes WHERE distance_km > 10
SELECT route_name, difficulty_level, distance_km FROM whitewater_rafting_routes WHERE difficulty_level='Intermediate' ORDER BY distance_km DESC
SELECT * FROM whitewater_rafting_routes WHERE safety_procedure LIKE '%safety%' ORDER BY route_name ASC
SELECT route_id, route_name, difficulty_level FROM whitewater_rafting_routes WHERE distance_km > 15
SELECT route_name, difficulty_level, distance_km, safety_procedure FROM whitewater_rafting_routes WHERE difficulty_level='Difficult' OR distance_km < 10 ORDER BY difficulty_level
SELECT * FROM whitewater_rafting_routes WHERE difficulty_level='Easy'
SELECT * FROM routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM routes WHERE difficulty_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE duration <= '02:00:00';
SELECT route_name, distance FROM routes WHERE difficulty_level = 2;
SELECT route_id, duration FROM routes WHERE distance BETWEEN 5.0 AND 10.0;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE difficulty_level > 3 ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT route_name, distance FROM routes WHERE route_id = 'b4c5f7cc-3120-448b-8c1b-1b8c2000533f';
SELECT route_name, difficulty_level, duration FROM routes WHERE distance > 10 AND difficulty_level < 5;
SELECT p.procedure_name, s.description FROM safety_procedures s JOIN routes r ON s.procedure_id = r.route_id;
SELECT AVG(difficulty_level) AS avg_difficulty, COUNT(*) AS total_routes FROM routes;
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, difficulty_level FROM routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name, distance FROM routes WHERE difficulty_level='Medium';
SELECT * FROM trip_details ORDER BY trip_date DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_time, end_time FROM routes JOIN trip_details ON routes.route_id = trip_details.route_id;
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, difficulty_level, distance FROM routes WHERE difficulty_level = 'Intermediate';
SELECT route_name, trip_date, start_time, end_time FROM routes JOIN trip_details ON routes.route_id = trip_details.route_id WHERE trip_date = '2022-06-15';
SELECT procedure_name, description FROM safety_procedures WHERE procedure_id IN (1, 3, 5);

SELECT route_name, difficulty_level, distance, trip_date, start_time, end_time, procedure_name FROM routes JOIN trip_details ON routes.route_id = trip_details.route_id JOIN safety_procedures ON trip_details.procedure_id = safety_procedures.procedure_id WHERE difficulty_level = 'Advanced';
SELECT * FROM trips;
SELECT trip_name, trip_location FROM trips WHERE trip_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT guide_name, guide_experience FROM guides ORDER BY guide_experience DESC;
SELECT rapid_name, rapid_difficulty FROM rapids WHERE rapid_location = 'River A' AND rapid_difficulty = 'Intermediate';
SELECT procedure_name, procedure_rating FROM safety_procedures WHERE procedure_rating > 4.0;
SELECT * FROM trips ORDER BY trip_date DESC, trip_name ASC
SELECT trip_name, trip_location FROM trips WHERE trip_location LIKE '%River%'
SELECT guide_name, guide_experience FROM guides WHERE guide_rating > 4.5
SELECT rapid_name, rapid_difficulty, rapid_location FROM rapids WHERE rapid_location = 'Colorado River'
SELECT procedure_name, procedure_rating FROM safety_procedures
SELECT * FROM trip_logs;
SELECT route_name, difficulty, distance_km FROM route_information;
SELECT MAX(experience_years) AS max_experience FROM raft_guides;
SELECT description AS procedure_description, procedure_name FROM safety_procedures;
SELECT guide_id, date, route_id FROM trip_logs ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM route_information ORDER BY difficulty ASC, distance_km DESC;
SELECT id, route_name, distance_km FROM route_information WHERE difficulty='Difficult' ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT r.route_name, g.name, l.date FROM trip_logs l LEFT JOIN route_information r ON l.route_id = r.id LEFT JOIN raft_guides g ON l.guide_id = g.id WHERE r.difficulty='Easy' ORDER BY l.date ASC;
SELECT p.procedure_name, p.description, r.raft_type FROM safety_procedures p INNER JOIN rafts r ON p.id = r.id WHERE r.capacity > 4 ORDER BY p.procedure_name;
SELECT g.name, g.experience_years, COUNT(l.trip_id) AS total_trips FROM raft_guides g LEFT JOIN trip_logs l ON g.id = l.guide_id GROUP BY g.id ORDER BY total_trips DESC, g.experience_years ASC;
